4:
Restore us, God of our salvation,
\q and let go of your displeasure with us.
\q
5:
Will you be angry with us forever?
\q Will you remain angry throughout future generations?
6:
Will you not revive us again?
\q Then your people will rejoice in you.
\q
7:
Show us your covenant faithfulness, Yahweh,
\q grant us your salvation.
8:
I will listen to what Yahweh God says,
\q for he will make peace with his people, his faithful followers.
\q Yet they must not turn again to foolish ways.
\q
9:
Surely his salvation is near to those who fear him;
\q then glory will remain in our land.
11:
Trustworthiness springs up from the ground,
\q and righteousness looks down from the sky.
12:
Yes, Yahweh will give his good blessings,
\q and our land will yield its crops.
\q
13:
Righteousness will go before him
\q and make a way for his footsteps.
85:
\m
\d For the chief musician. A psalm of the sons of Korah.
\q
